events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product does not match what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery based on the customer's description.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refund processing for swift handling.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your refund request regarding the incorrect item you received. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I ask you to share a photo of the item you received and your order confirmation details?
Here is the order number 123456789, and I attached photos of the product showing it’s not what I ordered. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for providing the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send back the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate how fast this is moving and will send back the item today using the label.
We confirm your refund has been processed and should appear in your account within 5-7 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was successfully received and if you need any further assistance with our services.
Since your refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Feel free to contact us anytime.
Please take a moment to complete a quick survey about your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is very important to us.
